fr.insarouen.battleship.net

Class CommunicationThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • fr.insarouen.battleship.net.CommunicationThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientCommunicationThread, ServerCommunicationThread

    public abstract class CommunicationThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Managing socket connections

    The CommunicationThread class give the possibility to manage the sending of standardized messages thanks to a socket connection
